mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_CODE FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_CODE DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, ADMIN_CODE) VALUES (#{TITLE}, #{CONTENT}, NOW(), 1010212)
INSERT INTO FILE (BOARD_CODE, FILENAME, REGDATE, ADMIN_CODE) VALUES (#{BOARD_CODE}, #{FILENAME}, NOW(), 1010212)
